config.bubble.section.name: Bubble
config.appearance.section.name: Appearance
config.groupingSorting.section.name: Grouping & sorting
config.groupingSorting.section.tooltip: If you want more sort fields, re-open the config menu.
config.show.section.name: Machines to show
config.misc.ignoreUnknownItems.name: Ignore unknown items/machines
config.misc.ignoreUnknownItems.tooltip:
Ignore items/machines which cannot be rendered (mostly ones added by Dynamic Game Assets).
If disabled, those machines will show an error texture instead.
config.anchor.screen.name: Screen anchor
config.anchor.panel.name: Panel anchor
config.anchor.inset.name: Inset
config.anchor.x.name: X offset
config.anchor.x.tooltip: Relative X offset from the anchor.
config.anchor.y.name: Y offset
config.anchor.y.tooltip: Relative X offset from the anchor.
config.layout.flowDirection.name: Flow direction
config.layout.scale.name: Scale
config.layout.xSpacing.name: X spacing
config.layout.ySpacing.name: Y spacing
config.layout.maxColumns.name: Max columns
config.bubble.showItem.name: Show item bubble
config.bubble.showItem.tooltip:
Whether to show an item bubble.
Disabling it will show a generic bubble instead.
config.bubble.itemCycleTime.name: Bubble item cycle time
config.bubble.itemCycleTime.tooltip:
Time (in seconds) for which each item in a grouped machine display will be displayed for.
For example, will be used if you have two Mushroom Boxes ready with a different mushroom each.
config.bubble.sway.name: Bubble sway
config.bubble.sway.tooltip:
Static: Bubbles don't move
Together: Bubbles move together
Wave: Bubbles create a wave effect
config.appearance.splitScreenScreens.too: Which screens to display the machine status on while in split screen mode.
config.appearance.visibilityKeybind.name: Visibility hotkey
config.appearance.alpha.focused.name: Focused alpha
config.appearance.alpha.focused.tooltip:
Transparency when the display is focused
(when hovering over with a mouse cursor, or after pressing a hotkey).
0: fully transparent
1: fully opaque
config.appearance.alpha.normal.name: Normal alpha
config.appearance.alpha.normal.tooltip:
Transparency when the display is not focused.
0: fully transparent
1: fully opaque
config.groupingSorting.grouping.name: Grouping
config.groupingSorting.sorting.name: Sorting #{{Ordinal}}
config.groupingSorting.sorting.tooltip: Note: sorting by distance requires additional calculations.
config.exceptions.name: Exceptions
config.show.ready.name: Show ready to pickup
config.show.ready.exceptions.name: Ready Exceptions
config.show.waiting.name: Show waiting for item
config.show.waiting.exceptions.name: Waiting Exceptions
config.show.busy.name: Show busy (processing)
config.show.busy.exceptions.name: Busy Exceptions
config.exceptions.manual.name: Custom
config.exceptions.manual.tooltip:
Comma-separated machine names to make exceptions for.
Use the * character for a wildcard.
Use the ? character for a word wildcard.
Use the | character for a word boundary.

For example, "*|Cask" will match "Cask", but also "Advanced Cask".
